attributes.action: Issue "Hoody" tops to all people of pensionable age.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Giving Hoody tops to pensioners would serve two purposes.They would provide an extra layer of clothing for warmth in winter and would also make them less popular with the members of the younger generation who use them to avoid identification during instances of crime and/ or anti-social behaviour.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
